title: The Waukesha Parade Suspect Was Out on Bail. Now the DA Is Probing How Bail Is Set
sub_head: Darrell Brooks, accused of killing five with his SUV at a Wisconsin Christmas parade, was charged with crimes this month but released on $1,000 bail
body:
WAUKESHA, Wis.â€”Low bail that led to the release of the man accused of driving an SUV through a downtown Christmas parade and killing five people here is prompting debates among lawmakers over bail policies in the state.
The suspect, 39-year-old Darrell Brooks, has a history of arrests. As recently as Nov. 5 he was charged with disorderly conduct and recklessly endangering safety after punching the mother of his child, then running her over with a vehicle, according to a complaint.
